body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Patterson Loving on June 15, 1852. Father of Carrie Loving, Willie Loving, and Elizabeth Loving. Merchant in Henry County, Tennessee in 1850. Merchant in Warren County in 1860. Merchant in Warren County in 1863.
